item.title: Compiler problem
item.dc:creator: @OjamaBoy OjamaBoy
item.description:
@OjamaBoy wrote:

if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
Thats what shows up in the compiler.
How do i change that to C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe?

Yes i know im having alot of problems.

Read full topic
